lead_paragraph: SINKMAN--Ellen. The Contemporary Freudian Society is saddened by the death of our longtime member and cherished colleague Ellen Sinkman. A supervising analyst, teacher and mentor, Ellen had a private psychoanalytic practice in New York City and Westchester. She was the author of "The Psychology of Beauty: Creation of a Beautiful Self" (2012) and the recipient of the CFS's Plumstock Award for two of her papers. Ellen will be deeply missed by family, friends and colleagues. Funeral services today (June 8) at 1pm at Riverside Memorial Chapel (180 W76 St., NYC). 1/3
